mre-dnd5e.SETTINGS.AutoRollChecksHint: Automatically roll the attack roll or tool check for the item if it exists.
mre-dnd5e.SETTINGS.AutoRollDamageHint: Automatically roll the first formula group for the item if it exists.
mre-dnd5e.SETTINGS.ShowDamageTotalHint: Whether or not to show the total result of all individual rolls in a combined damage card.
mre-dnd5e.SETTINGS.GlobalHint: This setting sets the default setting for all players.
mre-dnd5e.SETTINGS.LocalHint: This setting overrides the world default for this client only.
mre-dnd5e.SETTINGS.ModifierAdvHint: When holding this modifier key, MRE will roll a check or attack with advantage, or roll damage as critical damage.
mre-dnd5e.SETTINGS.ModifierDisAdvHint: When holding this modifier key, MRE will roll with disadvantage.
mre-dnd5e.SETTINGS.ModifierShowRollDialo: When holding this modifier key, MRE will show the roll dialog, rather than skipping it.
mre-dnd5e.SETTINGS.RollDialogBehaviorHin: Choose whether to show or skip the core dnd5e roll dialog when no modifier keys are held.
mre-dnd5e.FORMULA-GROUP.DialogHint: Configure formula groups and which formulae are included in each group.
mre-dnd5e.FORMULA-GROUP.GroupsMustNotBeE: You must have at least one formula assigned to a formula group.
mre-dnd5e.AUTO-ROLL.OverrideFalse: Force Auto Roll OFF for this item
mre-dnd5e.AUTO-ROLL.OverrideTrue: Force Auto Roll ON for this item
mre-dnd5e.AUTO-ROLL.Default: Use the default Auto Roll setting
mre-dnd5e.AUTO-ROLL.False: Auto Roll OFF for this item
mre-dnd5e.AUTO-ROLL.True: Auto Roll ON for this item
